meanings.def: having a baby or young animal developing inside her/its body
examples: pregnant with… I was pregnant with our third child at the time.
a heavily pregnant woman (= one whose baby is nearly ready to be born)
He got his girlfriend pregnant and they're getting married.
I discovered my cat was pregnant.
She was pregnant by a former boyfriend.
My sister is pregnant with twins.

meanings.def: full of a quality or feeling
examples: Her silences were pregnant with criticism.

meanings.def: an occasion when nobody speaks, although people are aware that there are feelings or thoughts to express
examples: There was a pregnant pause before she replied.

idioms.def: an occasion when nobody speaks, although people are aware that there are feelings or thoughts to express
examples: There was a pregnant pause before she replied.
